thread.title: Daryl Hall
thread.title_full: VIP Electronic Cigarette Ireland reviewed by Daryl Hall

author: Daryl Hall
title: Daryl Hall
text: I bought the VIP Photon Express Kit in Pavillions swords two weeks ago, the tank was leaking so i brought it back, the guy had a look at it and told me it was fixed, when i got home the same thing happened again. I live in Ashbounre co.meath and dont drive so it means getting two buses in each time to get in looked at.
